price: 68.Kaadu usun Yalla inkittoysaah Yallâ luk aka Yalla aqbude waah Yalli qidim kak caraamu abc nafsi qide waa niara sharqil kaa elle qidaanam kak xiqtam baahe num akke waytek, (islaam diinik korraaqek hinnay digbek lakal dalwa abek hinnay dulmih seehadayti Rooci yeyyeeqek) kaadu usun dalwa abe waah sinni sambo dalwak dacrisa тага kinnon, kaadu ama kaxxa dambittek tu-aba mari akeeral digaalá geele.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَدۡعُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ وَلَا يَقۡتُلُونَ ٱلنَّفۡسَ ٱلَّتِي حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا يَزۡنُونَۚ وَمَن يَفۡعَلۡ ذَٰلِكَ يَلۡقَ أَثَامٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna lā yadʿūna maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara walā yaqtulūna al-nafsa allatī ḥarrama al-lahu illā bil-ḥaqi walā yaznūna waman yafʿal dhālika yalqa athāman
